title: What is the true relationship between alchemy and modern chemistry?
first_phrase: This text discusses the relationship between alchemy and chemistry. While modern opinions on the chemical aspects of alchemy are somewhat accurate, the true meaning and significance of alchemy has been lost. The writer argues that rather than being an evolution of alchemy, modern chemistry is a degeneration of it. The author quotes Guénon, who believed that true alchemy was a science with spiritual significance and value, rooted in cosmology and human analogy. The last 200 tokens expand on this idea, delving deeper into the spiritual aspect of alchemy.

last_phrase: In conclusion, it can be said that modern chemistry did not evolve from ancient alchemy but rather represents a degenerate branch of it. The true essence of alchemy lies in its cosmological and spiritual teachings, which are symbolically significant. Understanding this difference is crucial in contextualizing the development of these two fields and appreciating their contributions to human knowledge.
